SiteNameAddress: Land at Heatherlea, Newick Lane, Heathfield

The site was also granted full planning permission under planning reference WD/2017/2954/F for the demolition of a static mobile home, annexe, workshops and outbuildings, alterations and additions to existing dwelling and erection of resdential development comprising six dwellings on 27/04/2018. The latest planning application refers the latter planning application for six dwellings.
